"愛用品の属性強化を！":
"Arks these days are so reckless! Don't
they understand that high attributes win
battles? How can they neglect the
fundamentals so easily? I shudder just
thinking about it.

Listen up! Repeat after me: \"Thou shalt
not ignore the attributes of thy weapon\"

Attributes are crucial. Why, in my day..."

"シンセサイザー
※1アカウントにつき3個、受注時に付与"
